Package hr.fer.zemris.java.tecaj.hw07.shell.commands

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCommand
    Abstract class for shell commands that share common properties (like name and description) and the same argument splitting rules.
    CatCommand
    Cat command writes contents of the given file.
    CharsetsCommand
    Charsets command lists names of supported charsets for your Java platform and takes no arguments.
    CopyCommand
    Copy command will copy given source file to given destination (file or directory).
    ExitCommand
    Command that terminates the shell and takes no arguments.
    HelpCommand
    Help command lists either all available commands or gives description for a requested command.
    HexdumpCommand
    Hexdump command produces hexadecimal representation of a file.
    LsCommand
    List directory contents command will list everything contained in given directory with it's basic attributes.
    MkDirCommand
    Make directory command will create the appropriate directory structure depending on given path (relative or absolute).
    SymbolCommand
    Symbol command allows user to view and change symbols for: prompt, multiline and morelines.
    TreeCommand
    Tree command prints given directory structure as a tree with each level shifted to the right.
